Question
========

Answerlist

* Not be rejected at significance level 0.250.
* Be rejected at significance level 0.250.
* Be rejected at significance level 0.100.

Solution
========

* Not be rejected at significance level 0.250...: Correct
* Be rejected at significance level 0.250...: Incorrect
* Be rejected at significance level 0.100.: Incorrect
